class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.MoveRecordSet
class.meta: Master Record for the set of Moves recorded in a specific time interval

property.name: mvrsRecordSetStatus
property.meta: Status (VIRGIN/PARTIAL/COMPLETE).

property.name: mvrsTimeIntervalStart
property.meta: Time at which the interval starts

property.name: mvrsTimeIntervalEnd
property.meta: Time at which the next interval starts

property.name: mvrsTimeExtracted
property.meta: Time at which this record set was extracted

many-to-one.name: mvrsOperator
many-to-one.meta: The Operator to which this MoveRecordSet belongs

many-to-one.name: mvrsComplex
many-to-one.meta: The Complex to which this MoveRecordSet belongs

many-to-one.name: mvrsFacility
many-to-one.meta: The Facility to which this MoveRecordSet belongs

many-to-one.name: mvrsYard
many-to-one.meta: The Yard to which this MoveRecordSet belongs

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.MoveRecord
class.meta: create index mvrc_to_pos_anchor_idx on mns_move_record(to_pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX; create index mvrc_fm_pos_anchor_idx on mns_move_record(fm_pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX;

create spatial index mvrc_to_pos_anchor_idx on mns_move_record(to_pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) ); create spatial index mvrc_fm_pos_anchor_idx on mns_move_record(fm_pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) );

many-to-one.name: mvrcMoveRecordSet
many-to-one.meta: MoveRecordSet to which this move belongs

property.name: mvrcMoveKind
property.meta: Move Kind (load/disch/receive, etc.).

property.name: mvrcMoveStage
property.meta: Last move stage completed.

property.name: mvrcUnitId
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

property.name: mvrcUnitCategory
property.meta: Unit category (IMPORT/EXPORT/...)

property.name: mvrcCtrBasicLength
property.meta: Basic length of the Contaner (20/40)

property.name: mvrcCtrNominalLength
property.meta: Nominal length of the Contaner (20/40/45/53/etc)

many-to-one.name: mvrcLineOperator
many-to-one.meta: Line Operator of the Unit at the time of the move

many-to-one.name: mvrcPOL
many-to-one.meta: Port of Loading

many-to-one.name: mvrcPOD
many-to-one.meta: Port of Discharge

many-to-one.name: mvrcFPOD
many-to-one.meta: Final Port of Discharge

many-to-one.name: mvrcCarrier
many-to-one.meta: The CarrierVisit, if the move was to or from a CarrierVisit, else null

property.name: mvrcExclude
property.meta: If TRUE, this record should be excluded from reporting.

property.name: posLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: posLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: posLocGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the Yard or CarrierVisit of this Position

property.name: posSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: posOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the Unit within this Position

property.name: posName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

many-to-one.name: posBin
many-to-one.meta: The bin to which this Position points to.

property.name: posTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: posAnchor
property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: posOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: posLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: posLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: posLocGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the Yard or CarrierVisit of this Position

property.name: posSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: posOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the Unit within this Position

property.name: posName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

many-to-one.name: posBin
many-to-one.meta: The bin to which this Position points to.

property.name: posTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: posAnchor
property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: posOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

many-to-one.name: mvrcCheFetch
many-to-one.meta: Che that executed the 'fetch' phase of the move

many-to-one.name: mvrcCheCarry
many-to-one.meta: Che that executed the 'carry' phase of the move

many-to-one.name: mvrcChePut
many-to-one.meta: Che that executed the 'put' phase of the move

many-to-one.name: mvrcCheQuayCrane
many-to-one.meta: The quay crane that did the move (will be also be the fetch or put che, denormalized for query convenience)

property.name: mvrcDistToStart
property.meta: Distance prime mover travelled in fetch phase, meters. SPARCS getHistoryDistToStart()

property.name: mvrcDistOfCarry
property.meta: Distance prime mover travelled in carry phase, meters. SPARCS getHistoryDistOfCarry()

property.name: mvrcTimeCarryComplete
property.meta: Time at which carry phase was completed. SPARCS getHistoryCarryCompl()

property.name: mvrcTimeDispatch
property.meta: Time at which move was dispatched. SPARCS getHistoryDispatchTime()

property.name: mvrcTimeFetch
property.meta: Time at which fetch phase was completed. SPARCS getHistoryFetchTime()

property.name: mvrcTimeDischarge
property.meta: Time at which discharge phase was completed

property.name: mvrcTimePut
property.meta: Time at which put phase was completed. SPARCS getHistoryPutTime()

property.name: mvrcTimeCarryCheStart
property.meta: Time at which carry phase is started.

property.name: mvrcTimeCarryCheFetchReady
property.meta: Time at which the carry CHE was ready to fetch. SPARCS 3.4: kWITagHistoryCarryCheFetchReadyTime

property.name: mvrcTimeCarryChePutReady
property.meta: Time at which the carry CHE was ready to put. SPARCS 3.4: kWITagHistoryCarryChePutReadyTime

property.name: mvrcTimeCarryCheDispatch
property.meta: Time at which the carry CHE was dispatched. SPARCS 3.4: kWITagHistoryCarryCheDispatchTime

property.name: mvrcRehandleCount
property.meta: Number of rehandles required to perform the move. SPARCS getHistoryRhndlCount()

property.name: mvrcTwinFetch
property.meta: True if we the Fetch phase was a twin move

property.name: mvrcTwinPut
property.meta: True if the Put phase was a twin move

property.name: mvrcRestowAccount
property.meta: Account to charge restow cost against. SPARCS getRestowAccount()

property.name: mvrcRestowFlag
property.meta: Type of Restow action.

property.name: mvrcServiceOrder
property.meta: The service order against which this move is to be charged

property.name: mvrcRestowReason
property.meta: Reason for restow. SPARCS getRestowReason()

property.name: mvrcFreightKind
property.meta: Freight Kind (MTY/FCL/.. etc).

property.name: mvrcIsLiveReefer
property.meta: A flag that specifies if the container is a live refrigerated container or not.

property.name: mvrcPow
property.meta: TODO : Get this clarified.

property.name: mvrcTripId
property.meta: Unique Id for the trip to which this move belongs.

property.name: mvrcTripDistLaden
property.meta: Total laden distance for the trip to which this move belongs.

property.name: mvrcTripDistUnladen
property.meta: Total unladen distance for the trip to which this move belongs.

property.name: mvrcUpdateTime
property.meta: UTC timestamp at which this record was updated.

property.name: mvrcGrossWeightLbs
property.meta: Gross weight in pounds

property.name: mvrcTareWeightLbs
property.meta: Tare weight in pounds

property.name: mvrcPayloadWeightLbs
property.meta: Payload weight in pounds

property.name: mvrcRoundedWeightLbs
property.meta: Rounded weight in pounds

property.name: mvrcNetWeightLbs
property.meta: Net weight in pounds

property.name: mvrcProcessed
property.meta: True if the che metrics are calculated for this move otherwise false

property.name: mvrcDBUniqueRefID
property.meta: WI unique ID from SPARCS

property.name: mvrcBooking
property.meta: Booking of the WI from SPARCS

property.name: mvrcChassis
property.meta: Chassis of the WI from SPARCS

property.name: mvrcCntrGrade
property.meta: Container grade from SPARCS

property.name: mvrcDamaged
property.meta: Indicates whether the container is damaged or not

many-to-one.name: mvrcDamageCodes
many-to-one.meta: Damage type of the container from SPARCS

property.name: mvrcUnitEquipType
property.meta: Container type from SPARCS

property.name: mvrcUnitClass
property.meta: Equipment class from SPARCS

property.name: mvrcUnitHeightFeet
property.meta: Equipment height in feet from SPARCS

property.name: mvrcOOGFlag
property.meta: Indicates whether the container is OOG (over dimensional) or not

property.name: mvrcChassisFlag
property.meta: Indicates whether the unit is container or chassis

property.name: mvrcTrailerFlag
property.meta: Indicates whether the unit is container or trailer

property.name: mvrcISOCode
property.meta: ISO code for the unit or equipment

many-to-one.name: mvrcYardTerminal
many-to-one.meta: The Yard to which this equipment or unit belongs

property.name: mvrcDestination
property.meta: The container's ultimate destination from SPARCS

many-to-one.name: mvrcGroup
many-to-one.meta: Container group from SPARCS

many-to-one.name: mvrcArriveVisit
many-to-one.meta: Inbound carrier for the move from SPARCS

property.name: mvrcArriveVisitFull
property.meta: Carrier name from SPARCS

property.name: mvrcIntendedTerm
property.meta: Intended terminal for the move

many-to-one.name: mvrcDepartVisit
many-to-one.meta: Outbound carrier for the move from SPARCS

property.name: mvrcDepartVisitFull
property.meta: Carrier name from SPARCS

property.name: mvrcOrigin
property.meta: The point from where the container first started its journey

many-to-one.name: mvrcOperationalLoadPort
many-to-one.meta: Container's Operational Load Port from SPARCS

property.name: mvrcService
property.meta: Service of the depart carrier

property.name: mvrcAppointmentTime
property.meta: Time of Appointment

property.name: mvrcYardInTime
property.meta: Yard in time of the container

property.name: mvrcYardOutTime
property.meta: Yard out time of the container

property.name: mvrcRailCarID
property.meta: Rail car Id

many-to-one.name: mvrcYardBlock
many-to-one.meta: Yard Block

property.name: mvrcCommodity
property.meta: Commodity

property.name: mvrcIMOCode
property.meta: IMO Code specified for the container

property.name: mvrcIMOCodeAll
property.meta: Multiple IMO Codes that are specified for the container

property.name: mvrcOverdimHeightCM
property.meta: Height in centi meters

property.name: mvrcUNNumber
property.meta: UN Number for the container

property.name: mvrcUNNumbers
property.meta: Multiple UN Numbers for the container

property.name: mvrcWeightClass
property.meta: Weight class

property.name: mvrcHazardousFlag
property.meta: Is the container hazardous

property.name: mvrcStopped
property.meta: Is the container has any stop flag

property.name: mvrcTruckCompany
property.meta: The company of the truck that picks up or drops off the container

property.name: mvrcTransactionID
property.meta: BAT number

property.name: mvrcTruckLicense
property.meta: The License plate of the truck that picks up or drops off the container

property.name: mvrcLiftType
property.meta: Crane lift type

property.name: mvrcUserVal1
property.meta: User Validated1

property.name: mvrcUserVal2
property.meta: User Validated2

property.name: mvrcUserVal3
property.meta: User Validated3

property.name: mvrcUser1
property.meta: User 1

property.name: mvrcUser2
property.meta: User 2

property.name: mvrcUser3
property.meta: User 3

property.name: mvrcUser4
property.meta: User 4

property.name: mvrcUser5
property.meta: User 5

property.meta: User 6

property.name: mvrcUser7
property.meta: User 7

property.name: mvrcUser8
property.meta: User 8

property.name: mvrcUser9
property.meta: User 9

property.name: mvrcUserA
property.meta: User A

property.name: mvrcUserB
property.meta: User B

property.name: mvrcUserC
property.meta: User C

property.name: mvrcUserD
property.meta: User D

property.name: mvrcUserE
property.meta: User E

property.name: mvrcUserF
property.meta: User F

property.name: mvrcUserG
property.meta: User G

property.name: mvrcUserH
property.meta: User H

property.name: mvrcUserI
property.meta: User I

property.name: mvrcUserJ
property.meta: User J

property.name: mvrcUserK
property.meta: User K

property.name: mvrcUserL
property.meta: User L

property.name: mvrcCheCarryLoginName
property.meta: Carry CHE Operator Login Name

property.name: mvrcChePutLoginName
property.meta: Put CHE Operator Login Name

property.name: mvrcCheFetchLoginName
property.meta: Fetch CHE Operator Login Name

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.VesselCraneStatistics
class.meta: Records a snapshot of the current state of crane's operation for the vessel visit

many-to-one.name: vcsCarrier
many-to-one.meta: Reference to the Carrier visit

many-to-one.name: vcsCrane
many-to-one.meta: Reference to the crane

property.name: vcsPlannedCompletion
property.meta: Latest Planned completion for this crane.

property.name: vcsEstimatedCompletion
property.meta: Latest Estimated completion for this crane.

property.name: vcsMovesToGo
property.meta: Number of moves to go for this crane.

property.name: vcsBaysWorked
property.meta: Count of bays worked by this crane.

property.name: vcsSequence
property.meta: Sequence in which this crane is scheduled for the given Vessel.

property.name: vcsUpdateTime
property.meta: UTC timestamp at which this record was updated.

property.name: vcsIsValid
property.meta: A flag that specifies if this object is currently valid or not.

property.name: vcsMultiSegment
property.meta: A flag that specifies if this ocrane has multiple segments or not.

property.name: vcsMovesCompleted
property.meta: Number of moves completed by this crane on this vessel.

property.name: vcsMovesLastHour
property.meta: Number of moves completed by this crane on this vessel in last 60 minutes.

property.name: vcsFirstMoveTime
property.meta: First move time for the crane.

property.name: vcsLastMoveTime
property.meta: Last move time for the crane.

property.name: vcsFirstActivityTime
property.meta: First activity time for the crane.

property.name: vcsLastActivityTime
property.meta: Last activity time for the crane.

property.name: vcsFinalMovesToGo
property.meta: Final moves to go for the crane.

property.name: vcsFinalETC
property.meta: Final etc for the crane.

property.name: vcsFinalMovesCompleted
property.meta: Final moves completed for the crane.

property.name: vcsTerminalDelay
property.meta: Terminal delay for the crane.

property.name: vcsNonTerminalDelay
property.meta: Non terminal delay for the crane.

property.name: vcsForceMajeureDelay
property.meta: Force Majeure delay for the crane.

property.name: vcsTotalDelay
property.meta: Total delay for the crane.

property.name: vcsEffectiveGrossGangHour
property.meta: Effective gross gang hour for the crane.

property.name: vcsSingleLoadCount
property.meta: Total number of single loads done by this crane.

property.name: vcsSingleDischargeCount
property.meta: Total number of single discharges done by this crane.

property.name: vcsSingleShobCount
property.meta: Total number of single SHOB moves done by this crane.

property.name: vcsTwinLoadCount
property.meta: Total number of twin loads done by this crane.

property.name: vcsTwinDischargeCount
property.meta: Total number of twin discharges done by this crane.

property.name: vcsTwinShobCount
property.meta: Total number of twin SHOB moves done by this crane.

property.name: vcsBreakBulkMoves
property.meta: Total number of break bulk moves done by this crane.

property.name: vcsHatchLidMoves
property.meta: Total number of hatch lid moves done by this crane.

property.name: vcsTwistLockMoves
property.meta: Total number of twist lock moves done by this crane.

property.name: vcsEgearMoves
property.meta: Total number of egear moves done by this crane.

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.CarrierStatistics
class.meta: Records a snapshot of the current state of carrier visit operation

many-to-one.name: csCarrier
many-to-one.meta: Reference to the Carrier visit

property.name: csVisitPhase
property.meta: Visit phase (CREATED, INBOUND ARRIVED, ...)

property.name: csCarrierName
property.meta: A String that represents the name of the carrier e.g. "President Madison".

property.name: csCarrierRef
property.meta: Unique reference id for this carrier

many-to-one.name: csLineOperator
many-to-one.meta: Line operator

property.name: csServiceCode
property.meta: Service code for the carrier, e.g. "PSX".

property.name: csETA
property.meta: Estimated Time of Arrival for this carrier.

property.name: csETD
property.meta: Estimated time of departure for this carrier.

property.name: csATA
property.meta: Actual Time of Arrival for this carrier.

property.name: csATD
property.meta: Actual time of departure for this carrier.

property.name: csEstimatedCompletionTime
property.meta: Estimated time of completion for the carrier.

property.name: csPlannedCompletionTime
property.meta: Planned time of completion for the carrier.

property.name: csMovesToGo
property.meta: Number of moves to go for this carrier.

property.name: csCraneCount
property.meta: Number of cranes working for this carrier.

property.name: csUpdateTime
property.meta: UTC timestamp at which this record was updated.

property.name: csMovesCompleted
property.meta: Number of moves completed for this carrier

property.name: csFirstMoveTime
property.meta: First move time for the carrier.

property.name: csLastMoveTime
property.meta: Last move time for the carrier.

property.name: csFirstActivityTime
property.meta: First activity time for the carrier.

property.name: csLastActivityTime
property.meta: Last activity time for the carrier.

property.name: csTerminalDelay
property.meta: Terminal delay for the carrier.

property.name: csNonTerminalDelay
property.meta: Non terminal delay for the carrier.

property.name: csForceMajeureDelay
property.meta: Force Majeure delay for the carrier.

property.name: csTotalDelay
property.meta: Total delay for the carrier.

property.name: csGrossGangHour
property.meta: Gross gang hour for the carrier.

property.name: csNetGangHour
property.meta: Net gang hour for the carrier.

property.name: csAllMovesProductivity
property.meta: All Moves Productivity for the carrier.

property.name: csCraneDensity
property.meta: Crane Density for the carrier.

property.name: csCraneSplit
property.meta: Crane Split for the carrier.

property.name: csMovesLastHour
property.meta: Moves last hour for the carrier.

property.name: csEffectiveGrossGangHour
property.meta: Effective gross gang hour for the carrier.

property.name: csEffectiveNetGangHour
property.meta: Effective net gang hour for the carrier.

property.name: csTotalContainerMoves
property.meta: Total container moves for the carrier.

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.SecondaryStatistics
class.meta: Secondary statistics table for all mensalytics entity.

property.name: secsStatisticsName
property.meta: Name of the statistics.

property.name: secsOwnerEntity
property.meta: Unique reference to the owner entity.

property.name: secsTimestamp
property.meta: Time at which this statistics was extracted.

property.name: secsValue
property.meta: Value of the statistics.

many-to-one.name: ybOperator
many-to-one.meta: The Operator to which this YardBlock belongs

many-to-one.name: ybComplex
many-to-one.meta: The Complex to which this YardBlock belongs

many-to-one.name: ybFacility
many-to-one.meta: The Facility to which this YardBlock belongs

many-to-one.name: ybYard
many-to-one.meta: The Yard to which this YardBlock belongs

many-to-one.name: ybAreaCode
many-to-one.meta: The yard area code to which this YardBlock belongs

property.name: ybUpdateTime
property.meta: Time at which this yard block was updated

property.name: ybBlockId
property.meta: Unique id for the block in the yard.

property.name: ybBlockType
property.meta: BlockType (STACK/LIST).

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.YardBlockStatistics
class.meta: Holds statistical information about yard block

many-to-one.name: ybsYardBlock
many-to-one.meta: Yard Block to which this block statistics belong

property.name: ybsTimeExtracted
property.meta: Time at which statistics about this yard block was extracted.

property.name: ybsTime
property.meta: Time extracted in HH:mm format

property.name: ybsTotalSlots
property.meta: Total number of slots in the block.

property.name: ybsUsedSlots
property.meta: Number of used slots in the block.

property.name: ybsUsableSlots
property.meta: Number of usable slots in the block.

property.name: ybsTotalReeferSlots
property.meta: Total number of reefer plugs in the block.

property.name: ybsUsableReeferSlots
property.meta: Number of usable reefer plugs in the block.

property.name: ybsUsedReeferSlots
property.meta: Number of used reefer plugs in the block.

property.name: ybsCurrentUnits
property.meta: Current units for a heap block.

property.name: ybsCurrentSlots
property.meta: Current TEUs for a heap block.

property.name: ybsPlannedUnits
property.meta: Planned units for a heap block.

property.name: ybsPlannedSlots
property.meta: Planned teus for a heap block.

property.name: ybsAreaCode
property.meta: Area Code for the block when the block statistics was extracted.

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.YardTierStatistics
class.meta: Holds statistical information about tiers for a block.

many-to-one.name: ytsYardBlock
many-to-one.meta: Yard block to which this yard tier statistics belong

property.name: ytsTimeExtracted
property.meta: Time at which statistics about this yard block tier was extracted.

property.name: ytsTierId
property.meta: Unique id for the tier in a block.

property.name: ytsTotalSlots
property.meta: Total number of slots in the tier.

property.name: ytsUsedSlots
property.meta: Number of used slots in the tier.

property.name: ytsUsableSlots
property.meta: Number of usable slots in the tier.

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.YardAreaCode
class.meta: Domain entity representing Yard Area Code

property.name: yacId
property.meta: Area Code Identity

property.name: yacDescription
property.meta: Yard Area Code Description

many-to-one.name: yacYard
many-to-one.meta: The Yard to which this Yard Area Code belongs

many-to-one.name: yacScope
many-to-one.meta: Scope of this instance

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.CheTripStatistics
class.meta: Holds statistical information about CHE trip

many-to-one.name: ctsYard
many-to-one.meta: The Yard to which this che trip belongs

property.name: ctsId
property.meta: Unique Identifier for che trip

many-to-one.name: ctsChe
many-to-one.meta: Che involved in this trip

property.name: ctsCheType
property.meta: Type of the che

property.name: ctsMoveKind
property.meta: Move Kind (load/disch/receive, etc.).

property.name: ctsChePhase
property.meta: che phase (fetch/carry/put, etc.).

many-to-one.name: ctsCheOperator
many-to-one.meta: Operator of this che

property.name: ctsDistLaden
property.meta: Total laden distance for the che trip

property.name: ctsDistUnladen
property.meta: Total unladen distance for the che trip

property.name: ctsFistContainerOnTime
property.meta: Time at which first container is picked up by che involved in this trip

property.name: ctsLastContainerOffTime
property.meta: Time at which last container is dropped by che involved in this trip

property.name: ctsFirstDispatchTime
property.meta: Time at which dispatch request is sent to pick up first container by che involved in this trip

property.name: ctsUnladenTravelTime
property.meta: Unladen Travel time for the trip

property.name: ctsLadenTravelTime
property.meta: Laden Travel Time for the trip

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.CheMoveStatistics
class.meta: Holds statistical information about individual CHE move

create index cms_to_pos_anchor_idx on mns_che_move_statistics(to_pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX; create index cms_fm_pos_anchor_idx on mns_che_move_statistics(fm_pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX;

create spatial index cms_to_pos_anchor_idx on mns_che_move_statistics(to_pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) ); create spatial index cms_fm_pos_anchor_idx on mns_che_move_statistics(fm_pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) );

many-to-one.name: cmsCheTrip
many-to-one.meta: Che trip for this che move

many-to-one.name: cmsCheSessionPeriod
many-to-one.meta: Che session period for this move

many-to-one.name: cmsMoveEvent
many-to-one.meta: The move event (inv_move_event) record corresponding to this che move

many-to-one.name: cmsMove
many-to-one.meta: The move record corresponding to this che move

many-to-one.name: cmsCarrier
many-to-one.meta: The CarrierVisit, if the che move was to or from a CarrierVisit, else null

many-to-one.name: cmsDeclrdIbCv
many-to-one.meta: The declared/documented inbound carrier to the Complex, which may differ from the actual

many-to-one.name: cmsDeclrdObCv
many-to-one.meta: The declared/documented outbound carrier from the Complex, which may differ from the actual

many-to-one.name: cmsCheQuayCrane
many-to-one.meta: Quay Crane who served or is served by this che

property.name: cmsUnitId
property.meta: Unit Id for the CHE move

property.name: cmsUnitCategory
property.meta: The Category of the Unit (Import, Export, ...).

property.name: cmsUnitFreightKind
property.meta: Freight Kind of Unit: MTY,FCL,LCL,BBK

property.name: cmsIsLiveReefer
property.meta: A flag that specifies if the container is a live refrigerated container or not.

property.name: cmsCtrBasicLength
property.meta: Basic length of the Contaner (20/40)

property.name: cmsEqTypIso
property.meta: equipment type code (ISO or other). Must be unique within reference set.

property.name: cmsCtrNominalLength
property.meta: nominal length: 20, 24, 30, 40, 45, 53

property.name: cmsWorkQueue
property.meta: SPARCS's reference to the owner work queue

property.name: cmsPow
property.meta: Sparcs reference to the point of work

property.name: cmsPool
property.meta: Sparcs reference to the Pool

property.name: posLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: posLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: posLocGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the Yard or CarrierVisit of this Position

property.name: posSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: posOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the Unit within this Position

property.name: posName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

many-to-one.name: posBin
many-to-one.meta: The bin to which this Position points to.

property.name: posTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: posAnchor
property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: posOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: posLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: posLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: posLocGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the Yard or CarrierVisit of this Position

property.name: posSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: posOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the Unit within this Position

property.name: posName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

many-to-one.name: posBin
many-to-one.meta: The bin to which this Position points to.

property.name: posTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: posAnchor
property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: posOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: cmsPickDispatchTime
property.meta: Time at which request was dispatched to pick the unit for this che move

property.name: cmsPickArriveTime
property.meta: Time at which che arrives to pick the unit for this che move

property.name: cmsLiftDispatchTime
property.meta: Time at which straddle is dispatched to lift a container, applicable for PR

property.name: cmsContainerOnTime
property.meta: Time at which container is put on the che

property.name: cmsDropDispatchTime
property.meta: Time at which request to drop the container is dispatched for the given che

property.name: cmsDropArriveTime
property.meta: Time at which che arrives to drop the container

property.name: cmsContainerOffTime
property.meta: Time at which container is taken off from the che

property.name: cmsPickIdleTime
property.meta: Time elapsed for a che until it received the dispatch request to pick a container

property.name: cmsPickWaitTime
property.meta: Time diff between the time the che arrives to pick the cntr and the time when the cntr is on the che

property.name: cmsDropIdleTime
property.meta: Time diff between the time the che arrives to pick the cntr and the time when the cntr is on the che

property.name: cmsDropWaitTime
property.meta: Time diff between the time the che arrives to drop the cntr and the time when it drops the cntr from the che

property.name: cmsRehandleCount
property.meta: Number of rehandles required to perform the che move.

property.name: cmsTwinMove
property.meta: True if this was a twin move

property.name: cmsLaneChange
property.meta: True if RTG changed lanes in order to perform this move

property.name: cmsPickDistance
property.meta: Total distance travelled by CHE to pick up the container associated with this che move.

property.name: cmsDropDistance
property.meta: Total distance travelled by CHE to drop the container associated with this che move.

property.name: cmsMoveDirection
property.meta: Direction of the move (from TZ, to TZ etc).

property.name: cmsMoveCategory
property.meta: Category of the move (WS In, Preposition etc). Not used, Refer to cmsMovePurpose (move_purpose)

many-to-one.name: cmsFromBlock
many-to-one.meta: Yard block from which the move is made

property.name: cmsFromBlockType
property.meta: Yard block type from which the move is made

many-to-one.name: cmsToBlock
many-to-one.meta: Yard block to which the move is made

property.name: cmsToBlockType
property.meta: Yard block type to which the move is made

property.name: cmsWaitTimeAtQC
property.meta: Wait time at QC (in ms)

property.name: cmsWaitTimeAtBlock
property.meta: Wait time at block (in ms)

property.name: cmsMovePurpose
property.meta: Category of the move (Transfer In, Transfer Out, Preposition etc).

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.CheOperatorStatistics
class.meta: Holds statistical information about individual CHE operator

many-to-one.name: cosCheOperator
many-to-one.meta: Che Operator

many-to-one.name: cosChe
many-to-one.meta: Che on which the operator is working

property.name: cosOperatorAction
property.meta: che operator action (login/logout/available.. etc.).

property.name: cosActionTime
property.meta: Time at which operator action takes place

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.CheSession
class.meta: Holds information about individual CHE sessions for a CHE operator

many-to-one.name: csesCheOperator
many-to-one.meta: Che Operator

many-to-one.name: csesChe
many-to-one.meta: Che on which the operator is working

property.name: csesLoginTime
property.meta: Time at which operator logins to the corresponding CHE

property.name: csesLogoutTime
property.meta: Time at which operator logs out from the corresponding CHE

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.CheSessionPeriod
class.meta: Holds information about periods within the CHE session such as AVAILABILITY, BREAK etc.

many-to-one.name: cspCheSession
many-to-one.meta: Che Session for this session period

property.name: cspStartTime
property.meta: Time at which period started

property.name: cspEndTime
property.meta: Time at which period ended

property.name: cspDuration
property.meta: Time duration for this period.

property.name: cspPeriodType
property.meta: Che Session Periods (AVAILABILITY/BREAK/ etc..).

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.EquipmentBlockVisit
class.meta: Holds information about equipment block visit details

many-to-one.name: ebvYard
many-to-one.meta: The Yard to which this equipment belongs

many-to-one.name: ebvBlock
many-to-one.meta: Block ID

many-to-one.name: ebvCms
many-to-one.meta: Reference to CheMoveStatistics

property.name: ebvEquipment
property.meta: Equipment ID

property.name: ebvTimeIn
property.meta: Time at which equipment enters block

property.name: ebvTimeOut
property.meta: Time at which equipment exits block

property.name: ebvMoveCount
property.meta: No. of moves done between the time the equipment enters and exits the block

property.name: ebvCheMoveDirection
property.meta: Time at which equipment exits block
